controlP5

Interface CDrawable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bang, Button, ButtonBar, Chart, ColorWheel, Controller, DropdownList, FrameRate, Icon, Knob, Label, ListBox, Matrix, MultiList, MultiListButton, Numberbox, Range, ScrollableList, Slider, Slider2D, Spacer, Textfield, Textlabel, TickMark, Toggle

    public interface CDrawable
    The CDrawable interface is used to draw controllers, primarily for internal use.
